title: Former UK and Sweden Ambassador Matthew Barzun | Foursquare Rums | Is Compromise Good?
itunes:title: Former UK and Sweden Ambassador Matthew Barzun | Foursquare Rums | Is Compromise Good?
description:
Former UK and Sweden Ambassador Matthew Barzun (Obama administration) joins the show to talk about what it's like to serve at the highest levels of government, to be a member of the Brown family of Brown-Forman and his new book, The Power of Giving Away Power. 
Buy his book: https://www.amazon.com/dp/0525541047/ref=as_sl_pc_qf_sp_asin_til?tag=httpwwwfredmi-20&linkCode=w00&linkId=934b64658668c3bfedbd33a7643dbcca&creativeASIN=0525541047
